Includes | string,searchValue,fromIndex | value | IMPLICIT | NONE
({ string, searchValue, fromIndex }, { value }) =>
    value.next(string.includes(searchValue, fromIndex))

original.description: Determines whether one string may be found within another string, returning true or false as appropriate
